"Echo":
"Ah...they're here.
These are the D-arkers we keep seeing around lately."

"Now then...we've gotta kill it. Now.
It'll just be more problems for us if it runs away."

"ああ……来ましたね。
最近見るようになったダーカーですよ。"

"さて……さっさと殺してしまわないと。
逃げられても面倒ですもんね。"
